name: Visualist
slogan: Productivity tools built to spark creativity

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.description:
***What will you do as a Product Designer?***

- Craft every detail of the Visualist experience, from idea to UX to pixel-perfection.
- Engage closely with our users to understand what they need, want, love, and hate.
- Develop our product roadmap.
- Run user research surveys, interviews, and focus groups.
- Analyse research data.
- Identify how our community is using Visualist and proactively help them achieve maximum value
- Collate and organise community feedback to inform product development

***This role might suit you if...***

- You understand the value of moving fast whilst avoiding the pitfalls of premature optimisation.
- You have sharp intuition for how people use or wish they could use products.
- You are fascinated by the infinite possibilities of visual database management, and how that can transform creative work.
- You are interested in systems design and thinking.
- You are excited about joining a startup as a founding designer, and want to take part in shaping the design fundamentals of a young company.
- You are at your best when untangling conceptual problems and drilling down into the details.
- You can clearly communicate decisions and the rationale behind them.
- You care about the business needs, implications, and possibilities of your designs.
- You are a master of the fine art of balancing form, functionality, beauty, and simplicity.
- You are a team player and organised.
- You are comfortable wearing many hats and dipping your toes in product, research, design, and community engagement.
- You love Figma.
- Bonus: You can do production-level coding in HTML, CSS & basic Javascript.

View more details and apply here: https://www.notion.so/visualist/Product-UX-UI-Designer-London-2064435339da4220a261ab7895f4bb75
